A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Totally frustrating and disappointing. The honourable thing to do would be for J.J. to remake the film with some of the scraps from VIII and new filming before moving on to IX. Give Luke the ending he deserves. Let General Aqbar put a fitting end to his lore arc by saving the fleet\, scrap Admiral (who?) Holdo\, etc\, etc. This film puts the the most beloved cinema saga of our time on a road to nowhere. REMAKE !
